text: My child has been enjoying her art classes here for several years. The teachers are friendly and accommodating to her needs and they create a fun and engaging atmosphere for the kids to learn without being afraid to try new things.

Very cozy art studio where my kids get to draw and interact with people of same interest. I have seen how my kids progressed in their interest and artistic skill and enjoy every lesson. The teachers and owner are nice, creative and fun. Highly recommended art learning haven for all age group.

Having a great time learning to paint in different media here. The guidance from the owner and her team has allowed me to hone my painting skills, alongside the inspirations from other adult learners and the occasional art exhibition trip. The scheduling flexibility is really helpful too!
Both my child is learning , they enjoy and have done many nice painting
The teachers are so patient with me as I learn and yet at the same time, they allow me total freedom of expression.
